readable.title: 1163282319_b729b24c46
readable.content: A girl dressed in a red top , a red cap , and light colored shorts , sits on a rock outside . A little girl in a red hat and yellow flip flops sits on a rock . A little girl with a red hood and shirt is sitting with legs sprawled on a rock , her mouth open . A young girl wearing yellow flip-flops is sitting on a large boulder . The little girl sits on top of a rock .
